title: HPI 11 - Carry a Big Stick - Ancient Indian Political Thought
itunes:title: HPI 11 - Carry a Big Stick - Ancient Indian Political Thought
description: Two figures from the Mauryan dynasty, Kautilya and the king Ashoka, set out contrasting ideas about the ideal political rule.
content:encoded: Two figures from the Mauryan dynasty, Kautilya and the king Ashoka, set out contrasting ideas about the ideal political rule.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
